name: Marcin Majkowski
body:
### Welcome
My name is Marcin and I'm currently living in Warsaw, Poland.

I consider myself as a passionate software engineer. My favourite programming language is Java but I'm comfortable with C++ and C as well. I also code in JavaScript, with main focus on AngularJS. Apart from pure coding, I enjoy software development in general - especially designinig applications architecture and their web APIs.

### Current work
Apart from working on exciting projects at Samsung R&D, I actively develop my own open source. Currently this is:
* Membership software - [Angular Material frontend](https://github.com/marcinmajkowski/membership-software-webapp), [Spring Java backend](https://github.com/marcinmajkowski/membership-software)
* godzinyzajec.pl - [Angular Material dashboard frontend](https://github.com/marcinmajkowski/godzinyzajec-pl-dashboard-webapp), [Spring Cloud Zuul proxy and Spring Security authentication for dashboard](https://github.com/marcinmajkowski/godzinyzajec-pl-dashboard), [Spring Java backend](https://github.com/marcinmajkowski/godzinyzajec-pl-api), and more...

### Contact
Feel free to contact me via my [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/marcinmajkowski) profile. I'm always happy to hear about interesting projects I can join in or to discuss my open source code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
